name: Ultima VIII: Pagan
overview: On the world of Pagan, the Guardian's forces are firmly entrenched and his control is absolute. The rules are different here from familiar Britannia, and you must discover how to defeat the ruling Elemental Titans on their own terms, while solving the mistery of their enigmatic pentagram. The time has come to bring the battle to the Guardian. The CD-ROM version includes both Pagan: Ultima VIII and the optional Pagan: Ultima VIII - Speech Pack.
